title: Remove Caffeine watermark from all pages

requirements.summary: Remove the 'Built with using caffeine' attribution text and link from the Footer component
acceptanceCriteria: The caffeine.ai attribution link is completely removed from the footer
The footer layout remains properly formatted after removal
All pages (home, join, schedule, gallery, info, links, about, contact, top10) display the updated footer without the watermark

file_operations.description: Remove the caffeine.ai attribution section from the footer component while preserving the copyright and sponsor information. The footer contains three columns with club branding, quick links, and social media. Remove the link element containing 'Built with using caffeine' and the caffeine.ai URL with UTM tracking parameters. Ensure the footer layout remains properly formatted after the removal, maintaining the existing grid structure and spacing.
